backend/main.mo: Defines all core game types, progress models, comparison helpers, and in-memory data maps, with authorization mixin and placeholders for user-facing query/update methods.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration logic converting old progress data to the new format by adding difficulty fields and initializing level progress.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for difficulty, question generation, times tables, and rewards.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides concise summaries of many frontend files covering routing, UI components, hooks, state, and game logic.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/videos/README.txt: Explains required help video files, naming conventions, formats, and recommended resolutions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, age‑group guards, and global providers for the main React app layout.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that catches UI errors and displays a themed recovery screen with reload option.
frontend/src/components/game/AnswerPad.t: Numeric input pad component that builds a number string and submits it. Supports clear, submit, and disabled state.
frontend/src/components/game/DifficultyS: Card-based radio selector for choosing a difficulty level using predefined options. Updates parent via onChange.
frontend/src/components/game/FeedbackBan: Displays a correct or incorrect feedback banner with icon and random message. Hidden when no type is provided.
Defines HelpTopic type and a list of help topics with video paths, fallback text, and emojis.
frontend/src/components/help/HelpVideoCa: Renders a help topic with a video player and fallback text on error. Shows topic title, emoji, and content inside a card.
frontend/src/components/layout/KidLayout: Page layout with themed background, navigation, age badge, main content slot, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeade: Centered page header showing title, optional subtitle, emoji, and optional mascot.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Wrapper component that constrains max width and provides vertical spacing for pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/SelectedA: Displays a fixed-position badge showing the selected age group using context data.
frontend/src/components/mascot/Mascot.ts: Shows an animated mascot image that varies by state (idle, cheer, encourage).
frontend/src/components/nav/MainNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with labeled icon buttons that highlight the active route and navigate using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/progress/StarsRo: Renders a row of stars indicating progress, with filled stars animated based on count.
frontend/src/game/difficulty.ts: Defines frontend difficulty options, mapping to backend difficulty, and provides multipliers for question count and range.
frontend/src/game/questionGenerator.ts: Generates math questions based on game type, age group, and difficulty using randomized number ranges.
frontend/src/game/roundEngine.ts: Manages round state, scoring, progression, and produces final round results with stars and time spent.
frontend/src/game/timesTables.ts: Generates times table data and questions, supporting difficulty-based question counts and predefined table list.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines shared math-game types for questions, round state, results, and feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading and managing identities and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useProgress.ts: Tracks local and backend progress, storing attempts, best scores, and stars per activity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for profiles, results, progress, rewards, and stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useStickerRewards.ts: Manages sticker rewards locally, awarding and retrieving earned stickers.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimesTablesPractic: Stores and updates times‑tables practice state including tables, difficulty, score, and attempts.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light/dark modes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitySelectPage.ts: Renders activity selection UI with difficulty options, progress display, and navigation to play.
frontend/src/pages/AgeSelectPage.tsx: Displays age group options and saves the selected group before navigating to activity selection.
frontend/src/pages/HelpPage.tsx: Lists help topics and renders video cards for learning math concepts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main menu with navigation to games, times tables, help, and progress, adapting behavior based on age group selection.
frontend/src/pages/play/PlayRoundPage.ts: Runs a game round by generating questions, handling answers, tracking progress, and saving results.
frontend/src/pages/play/RoundSummaryPage: Shows round results, awards stickers, updates progress, and optionally syncs data to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays total stars, activity progress, and earned stickers for the selected age group.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows changing age group and managing login/logout using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/times-tables/TimesTab: Interactive view for browsing and displaying multiplication tables with navigation and table buttons.
Main times tables page with tabs switching between learning and practice modes.
Practice mode handling question generation, user answers, scoring, and progress tracking across selected tables.
frontend/src/rewards/stickers.ts: Defines sticker rewards and a deterministic selector based on completion count.
frontend/src/state/ageGroup.ts: Defines age group metadata and helpers for converting between frontend and backend age group formats.
frontend/src/state/AgeGroupContext.tsx: Context provider for storing and updating the selected age group using localStorage.
frontend/src/theme.ts: Theme configuration describing colors, typography, and design principles for the kids’ math app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and layout settings for the app.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state for a kids’ math game, including app goals, UI guidelines, age‑group structure, required stickers, known issues, and existing feature versions. Serves as the central specification and planning reference for gameplay, visuals, and progression.
